MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. It is for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.30pm remove an obstruction on the overhead lines near Overfield House and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.44pm on Thursday 14th January 2021.
